definitions.title: vb.Pi.
definitions.body: shape, fashion (NH Pi. stretch child into shape; Buhl:Lex cp. 9ad.aba out, cut off [whence idea of carving, fashioning]);—

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. [[יׇדֶיךָ עִצְּבוּנִי וַעיַּעֲשׂוּנִי]] Job 10:8 thy hands shaped me, etc.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Inf.cstr. [[לְהַעֲחִבָה]] Je 44:19, but rd. [[בָהּ]]-, to fashion her, i.e. make images of her (poss. denom. from [[עָחָב]]).
